analyzed: gdab pa dang po gnam thig ste //

analyzed: tshon ni byin brlabs bzlas te dgye //

original: bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa yang //
analyzed: bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa yang //

original: sgo dbye bum dgod lhar bskyed de //
analyzed: sgo dbye bum dgod lhar bskyed de //
translated: Open the door, set out the vases, generate the deities,

original: nam mkha'i lha tshogs phab la bsre //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lha tshogs phab la bsre //

original: bdag nyid dang po'i lhar bskyed de //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang po'i lhar bskyed de //

original: de nas sgo dbye la sogs pa //
analyzed: de nas sgo dbye la sogs pa //

original: sngon du ba stan pa bzhin du bya //
analyzed: sngon du ba stan pa bzhin du bya //

original: phyi rol dag tu byung byas la //
analyzed: phyi rol dag tu byung byas la //

original: 'jig rten pa la gtor ma spyin //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la gtor ma spyin //

original: slar la nang du zhugs byas la //
analyzed: slar la nang du zhugs byas la //

original: spyin sreg dag gis tshim par byas //
analyzed: spyin sreg dag gis tshim par byas //

original: de nas slob ma 'jug pa yang //
analyzed: de nas slob ma 'jug pa yang //

original: lha la gsol gdab ngang bar bsam //
analyzed: lha la gsol gdab ngang bar bsam //

original: slob mas khrus byas me tog thogs //
analyzed: slob mas khrus byas me tog thogs //

original: yol bas bcad la phyi rol dgug / slob mas phyag byas gsol ba gdab //üîΩgdong dang stod g-yogs smad g-yogs te /
analyzed: yol bas bcad la phyi rol dgug / slob mas phyag byas gsol ba gdab // gdong dang stod g-yogs smad g-yogs te /

original: nang bkug phyag bya sdig pa bshags //
analyzed: nang bkug phyag bya sdig pa bshags //

analyzed: dam tshig bsgrag cing de la mchod //

original: las kyi bum pas dbang yang bskur //
analyzed: las kyi bum pas dbang yang bskur //

original: sgo bzhir bcug la slar yang ni //
analyzed: sgo bzhir bcug la slar yang ni //

original: shar sgor bzhag la mna' yang bsgags //
analyzed: shar sgor bzhag la mna' yang bsgags //
translated: one is placed at the eastern door and the oath is given.

original: mna' chu blud la ye shes dbab //
analyzed: mna' chu blud la ye shes dbab //

original: mchod cing smrar gzhug phreng ba dor //
analyzed: mchod cing smrar gzhug phreng ba dor //

original: mgo la bcings te snang ba brtag / mig dbye ba dang dkyil 'khor ba stan //
analyzed: mgo la bcings te snang ba brtag / mig dbye ba dang dkyil 'khor ba stan //
translated: The eyes are opened and the ma·πá·∏çala is shown.

original: dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang //

original: sgrub pa po dang slob @34b dpon ni //
analyzed: sgrub pa po dang slob @34b dpon ni //

original: sgrub pa po ru dbang bskur na //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ru dbang bskur na //

original: rang gi lhar bskyed de la mchod //
analyzed: rang gi lhar bskyed de la mchod //

original: dang po rig pa'i dbang bskur te //
analyzed: dang po rig pa'i dbang bskur te //

original: bkra shis brjod cing chu dbang bskur //
analyzed: bkra shis brjod cing chu dbang bskur //

original: dbu rgyan dang ni rdo rje spyin //
analyzed: dbu rgyan dang ni rdo rje spyin //

original: dril bu dang ni ming yang gdags //
analyzed: dril bu dang ni ming yang gdags //
translated: the bell, and the name are also conferred.

original: gsang ba'i ye shes sngags kyang spyin //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes sngags kyang spyin //

original: phyag rgya bzhi brlab brtul zhugs spyin //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi brlab brtul zhugs spyin //
translated: The consecration of the four mudras and the vow of conduct

original: slob dpon dag tu dbang bskur na //
analyzed: slob dpon dag tu dbang bskur na //

original: shar sgor sna tshogs padma bri //
analyzed: shar sgor sna tshogs padma bri //

original: slob ma sangs rgyas dang por bskyed //
analyzed: slob ma sangs rgyas dang por bskyed //

original: rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya //
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya //

original: dam tshig gsum dang gsang ba dang // gsang rgyal dang ni nges pa'i dbang //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum dang gsang ba dang // gsang rgyal dang ni nges pa'i dbang //

original: rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //

original: dam tshig gsum la rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum la rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the three sacred pledges, there is the vajra, the bell, and the mudra.

original: gsang ba'i dbang la dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang slob dpon las rnams so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang la dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang slob dpon las rnams so //
translated: In the secret empowerment, there is the mandala, the deity, and the activities of the master.

original: gsang rgyal dag gi dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: gsang rgyal dag gi dbang bskur ba //

original: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang // rin po che dang padma dang // las kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang // rin po che dang padma dang // las kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: is the secret of the tathƒÅgata family, the vajra family, the ratna family, the padma family, and the karma family.

original: nges pa'i dbang la gzhan don dang // rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i dbang la gzhan don dang // rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ro //

original: gzhan don nges pa'i dbang bskur na //
analyzed: gzhan don nges pa'i dbang bskur na //
translated: If the definite consecration of the benefit of others is to be performed,

original: bye brag dag dang spyi dag go //
analyzed: bye brag dag dang spyi dag go //
translated: [the consecration] is of the particular and the general.

original: bye brag la yang 'di lta ste //
analyzed: bye brag la yang 'di lta ste //
translated: The particular is as follows:üîΩLikewise, the definite consecration of the vajra family,

original: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang // rin chen rigs dang padma dang // las kyi rigs kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang // rin chen rigs dang padma dang // las kyi rigs kyi nges pa'o //
translated: the jewel family, the lotus family, and the action family.

original: rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ba //
translated: The consecration of the definite benefit for oneself

original: gsang ba'i ye shes brlab cing sngags kyang spyin //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes brlab cing sngags kyang spyin //
translated: is the consecration of the secret gnosis, and the mantra is also given.

original: phyag rgya bzhi brlab lung yang ba stan //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi brlab lung yang ba stan //

original: gzengs bstod pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: gzengs bstod pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o //

original: de mthar dbang ba stan bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de mthar dbang ba stan bya ba'i phyir //

original: brtul zhugs dag gi dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: brtul zhugs dag gi dbang bskur ro //

original: de ltar dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod //
analyzed: de ltar dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod //

original: dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya //
analyzed: dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya //

original: smon lam btab la don gsol gdab //
analyzed: smon lam btab la don gsol gdab //

original: ye shes gshegs la dkyil 'khor bsdu //
analyzed: ye shes gshegs la dkyil 'khor bsdu //

analyzed: brgya pa bzlas shing gzugs brnyan bkru //

original: lhag chad bskang phyir spyin sreg bya //
analyzed: lhag chad bskang phyir spyin sreg bya //

analyzed: mtshan brjod pa yi gsung rab bsgrags //

analyzed: gsang ldan ma yi pundartha //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdun gyi tho yig 'di //

analyzed: bdag gis bsdebs pa'i dge ba yis // kun gyis 'jam mgon thob par shog / gsang ldan ma'i tho yig pundartha byas @35a * //

original: pa smri ti dzny'a na k'irti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: pa smri ti dzny'a na k'irti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so //
